channel.title: Adding new crowns. rights 2 and 3 are same crown?
channel.description:
So I'm trying to overhaul my crowns on my server. I'm tired of the classic ones and I'm adding a lot more. I know player rights go something like this: 0 = Player 1 = Mod 2 = Admin 3 = Owner 4 = Donor/hiddin/blank 5 = Blank 6 = Blank 7 = Blank
I set it to this: 0 = Player 1 = Mod 2 = Admin 3 = Owner 4 = Coder 5 = Donor 6 = V.I.P 7 = Extreme Donor
And I modified every part of my client to have it like that. MODICON 0 is supposed to be Mod and it goes up by one from there. Ending at 6. That shouldn't be a problem though since that's how it is normally set.
But when I log in MODICON 1 is set to mod and Owner crown shows for both Owner and Admin. Can someone help? EDIT: and to top it all off only 4 icons show..

item.title: Adding new crowns. rights 2 and 3 are same crown?
item.dc:creator: @noty noty
item.description:
@noty wrote:

did u make ur server from 100% self? or u just found one on moparscape and changed the name (copy) if u did the last thing i said i dunno the reason why this happend

Read full topic
item.source: Adding new crowns. rights 2 and 3 are same crown?

item.title: Adding new crowns. rights 2 and 3 are same crown?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

So I’m trying to overhaul my crowns on my server. I’m tired of the classic ones and I’m adding a lot more.
I know player rights go something like this:
0 = Player
1 = Mod
2 = Admin
3 = Owner
4 = Donor/hiddin/blank
5 = Blank
6 = Blank
7 = Blank

I set it to this:
0 = Player
1 = Mod
2 = Admin
3 = Owner
4 = Coder
5 = Donor
6 = V.I.P
7 = Extreme Donor

And I modified every part of my client to have it like that. MODICON 0 is supposed to be Mod and it goes up by one from there. Ending at 6. That shouldn’t be a problem though since that’s how it is normally set.

But when I log in MODICON 1 is set to mod and Owner crown shows for both Owner and Admin. Can someone help?
EDIT: and to top it all off only 4 icons show…
